name: Gugu Gaga
description:
GUGU GAGA TO ALL,

Help the babies to say their first word by satisfying their needs! 

You are a little kindergarten businessman whose goal is to encourage other babies to speak... and build yourself a dream castle with their bricks. 

All the voiceovers were collected on site. Thanks to everyone who have been brave enough to participate! There is about 100 of your words and other squeaks in the game!

Enjoy our game!

Made by family team Vlachulata

How to play - controls:

Press any key to continue to the next scene.

BOTTLE - keep temperature in the middle by pressing arrows

BABY BACK - click to pop the bubbles

POTTY - smash arrows as fast as you can

DIAPER - hold the up arrow to estimate the strength of your throw

DUMMY - click on the mug to find the hidden dummy

Team Vlachulata:

Karel - team leading and programming 

Karolína  - sounds and graphics

Honza - programming

Zuzka - graphics and sounds

+ all brave people who agreed to the voice recording

Credit for the rest of the music goes to Pixabay and their creators:

jackthemurray, ianslattery, sergeQuadrado, kinoton,123jorre456, Lemonmusicstudio, animusic, leonelmail, mondayHopes, lemonmusicstudio, lemonmusicstudio, REDproduction, scarbelly25, dmitrytaras
